website_summaries.verdict: Trusted brand name furniture that will last many years.
pros: The 2 chairs included in this set have unique, curved armrests
Wicker includes 2 shades of brown that make the braided design pop out
Cushions don't fade, and can be cleaned with mild soap and water
cons: Assembly is easiest with 2 people, a drill, and allen wrench

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and customer warranty support
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set in July 2018, was very pleased with the appearance and assembly. Around Thanksgiving we noticed the tear in a cushion. I contacted Ashley customer support via email, numerous times. Sent them all the requested information required for "what I thought" was going to be a smooth warranty transaction. I have requested an update status to my claim, as of this writing 12/28, no confirmation of warranty status. The combination of poor material quality and poor to no customer support, would steer away from Ashley
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should be 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The furniture is fantastic. Looks and feels great. No assembly required. Came in 1 box. Unfortunately the delivery guy had no helper! He was by himself. I'm a 35 year old guy so I didn't mind helping to carry it in, but someone else might not be able to because it was a big box and 160lbs. The furniture though, is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Table doesn’t fit together
customer_reviews.text: The bottom shelf (part “J”) of the table does not have square corners so the table will not fit together. If I can get just that part replaced I will gladly rate this item with more stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Cushion fabric is not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It ended up being physically smaller than we expected. I’m not saying the advertised dimensions are wrong, I’m sure they are correct. It’s just that the sofa it’s a little bit smaller than local brands we had tried out. Also, the fabric on the cushions and pillows does not seem to breathe as well as other fabrics we have had in the past. It’s not hard to start sweating on a warmer day.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas V. Di Iulio

customer_reviews.title: looks elegant and sturdy. very comfy too!
customer_reviews.text: very satisfied! Beautiful and sturdy. I searched a lot for an outdoor set and I am very satisfied with my purchase. I saw it in Ashley site , it was more expensive in their site and also has $120 for delivery. I am glad that I find it here with prime shipping!! Assembly is not a big deal but takes sime time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sina Ghaffaripour

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Great but Ashley Furniture Not
customer_reviews.text: Expected to assemble but ten hours was ridiculous. Tool provided would not work in some places. Had to buy another. Some bolts would not line up and some were too short. Had to buy more bolts. Ashley's WeCare would not respond to contacts. Furniture was nice but not put together with any thought to easy assembly
customer_reviews.author: Djwkl

customer_reviews.title: This is the best quality outdoor set I have seen
customer_reviews.text: This is the best quality outdoor set I have seen. Frame feels sturdy, the cushion fabric is very thick, and actually seems like it will hold up to an outdoor environment. It has a bit of a rough texture, but I think that will be a good thing for durability. Instructions for assembly were the worse I have ever seen. It was 2 steps... step 1: remove cushions, step 2: picture of completed set with a note to tighten all screws. Does not tell you how many screws, or where they are or how to orient the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and very attractive set.  Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality here. The cushions look like they are built to withstand some serious use. The furniture itself is sturdy and appears to be durable (hard to say since we've only had for a week...but they don't feel at all flimsy). When this arrives in its giant box, there will be some assembly required, but it was fast and easy to do so, and all the tools were provided. We're super happy with the attractive set. (We got the grey...it's a very subtle and pleasing color, not at all drab like one might worry grey would be.) RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: RMurray847

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor furniture is sturdy, and at the same time, looks very nice, what you'd expect from a national manufacturer like Ashley. The pillows and seating are very comfortable, and the lounge is exceptionally so. I have an indoor patio/porch, and this ensemble looks rich and comfy, blending in well with my other patio furniture. The price is reasonable, as well. You can't go wrong with this Ashley Signature Design.
customer_reviews.author: Perfect Moment

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice outdoor furniture set. I’m loving the darker colors and the grey and black. The cushions are well made. Was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie V. Galasso

product_meta.title: Signature Design by Ashley P333-081 Meadow Town Patio Sectional, Red/Brown
product_meta.description: Color:Red/BrownStyle. Comfort. Quality. Value. The Meadow town 4-piece outdoor furniture set really goes to town, giving you the total package for outstanding outdoor living. Crafted to withstand the elements, this outdoor furniture set's rust-proof aluminum frames offer the look of gently weathered wicker for an easy-breezy aesthetic. High-design touches include curved track arms and rich red cushions punctuated with white piping for a crisp, fresh feel. Perhaps best of all: the all-weather Nuvella fabric is as comfortable as it is durable.
feature_bullets: OUTDOOR FURNITURE SET: Style that speaks for itself. From the rich red cushions to the gently weathered wicker, it's a stunning choice for your pool side oasis or back yard retreat
DURABLE DESIGN: Foam cushion cores are supported by all weather wicker handwoven on rust proof aluminum frames. Zippered cushions are covered in high-performance Nuvella polyester fabric
CONTEMPORARY STYLE: Outside dining is such an elegant way to entertain—especially during summer. With comfortable seating and the ultra clean-lined frame, it's a modern enthusiast's dream
SET OF 4: Includes sofa, coffee table and 2 lounge chairs. Sofa measures 76" W x 30" D x 30" H, coffee table measures 44" W x 25" D x 17" H, and lounge chairs each measure 32" W x 30" D x 30" H
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions, tools and hardware included. 2 throw pillows included. Clean fabric with mild soap and water, let air dry
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars21 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
